question: What is the first stage of any data science life cycle?

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Data cleanup is part of the data exploration stage which is the second stage of the life-cycle.
Data visualization is part of the data exploration stage which is the second stage of the life-cycle. Data visualization can also be used in the final stage of the project for reporting insights.
Data acquisition is the first stage of the data science life cycle. Data can be collected by the data scientist or gathered previously and provided to the data scientist.

detailedSolution: Data acquisition is the first stage of the data science life cycle. Data can be collected by the data scientist or gathered previously and provided to the data scientist.
